title: Fireside with the Underboss - "He Asked Paul For Permission to Kill His Own Son Over $200k"
description: Sammy tells us about his interactions with a very wealthy and dangerous man, Joe "The Cat" Laforte. Joe seems to have beef with John Gotti, so he comes to Sammy begging for help to resolve it.
itunes:author: Sammy "The Bull" Gravano
itunes:subtitle: Sammy tells us about his interactions with a very wealthy and dangerous man, Joe "The Cat" Laforte. Joe seems to have beef with John Gotti, so he comes to Sammy begging for help to resolve it.
